title: Is this really PES EC campus
content: I thought everyone in this subreddit complained about the infrastructure but is this really PES at EC campus? Is EC campus getting new classrooms for btech as well?

comments.body:
>I thought everyone in this subreddit complained about the infrastructure

Literally no one complains about the infra, that's the only good thing here
People only complain because rr had better infra but ec also isn't bad by any means...
But still EC campus infra pales in comparison to RR

That's the mrd building, barely a year old
New grade are lucky, infra is improving 

Usually when u hear complains abt infra it's stuff like few open drains, rain water clogging , few broken chairs in the pixel canteen and 4th floor
Jus visit the campus ull know what I'm talking abt

yes that is ec campus, the mrd student center is very nice.  
the examination center is quite new too.   
idk about new classrooms but there are some renovations going on in the sem halls.   
we did get a new robotics lab from KUKA.   
They did also fix a stupid swamp like place and made into a nice garden sort of thing.   
The three points above are stuff they have done this year.   
EC infra is ok ish in comparison to RR.  
RR infra is next level.

You guys don't have AC?


RR seems nice but conjusted and crowded.Â

only sem hall and labs have AC, the auditorium is obv AC too.   
yeah rr does have high crowd, i honestly dont know how bad it is on a normal day, i have only been for some events.
How do u survive in class? Won't it get really hot later on?
Wait ec campus has ac in classrooms?
Is this mrd centre available to all students or is it paid? And how much do we have to pay

only gym is paid, rest is free.  
Gym is 6k a year.
